name: Collateral Thrash
summary: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.
description:
When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby. Another foe adjacent to the grabbed foe also takes your Thrash damage, with a basic Reflex save against your class DC.Collateral Thrash Leads To...

Whirlwind TossTraitsRage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
